attributes.action: Include sole traders in the Kick Start scheme.
attributes.additional_details:
In Okehampton alone we have over 30 jobs being offered by mostly sole traders.  We are joining together with excellent efficiency and good working practice. We supported the country and will continue to do so and we deserve the same opportunities. Support us to support our communities.
Thank you.
attributes.background: Sole traders are able to offer quality employment in a wide variety of sectors. We seek to be included in the Kick Start Scheme and recognised as small businesses equally to limited companies.
